author: tatuvlakia
title: A Lego classic!
review:
Not much to review, just a classic way of storing your Lego collection while young.

Not of much use if your collection is big, but for a kid with a few sets, it is a very practical way of storing.

Great quality denim, well made, and very durable.

Still have it, and use it for some sets to get that classic Lego way of playing by opening this bag on the floor and spreading all the bricks!
